Our Technology Stack: Salesforce (primary), HubSpot (marketing automation), Microsoft Dynamics 365 (integration). Investment in digital platforms shows commitment to technology-driven operations...
About Arsenal: Arsenal FC is a professional football club based in Holloway, London. The club plays in the Premier League and has a global fanbase of approximately 100 million followers...
Stadium Capacity: 60,704. Venue: Emirates Stadium. The club operates state-of-the-art facilities including digital infrastructure throughout the stadium...
Strategic Partnerships: Official technology partner includes Salesforce. Recent procurement of digital analytics platforms demonstrates continued investment...

reasoning_summary:
